text: @JoeBiden @msmassie16 I appreciate that, but trump and someone in his organization is responsible for the coronavirus. They called it a racial slur in retaliation against the Chinese government. What real POTUS would do that or allow anyone else to? https://t.co/uNiwyfj5VK

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
